title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 81.9 - Community relations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 81.9 - Community relations

State Regulations
(a) The
facility shall participate appropriately in local, institutional and regional
planning related to programs for the mentally retarded. (b) Significant changes in the program of the
facility shall take into account studies of needs and resources in the
geographic area served by the facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
81.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
